      base = knitr::opts_knit$get('base.url')
      if (is.null(base)) base = ''
      alt = ifelse (is.null(options$alt),"",options$alt)
      cap = ifelse (is.null(options$caption),"",options$caption)
      if (alt != ""){
        sprintf('![%s](%s%s "%s")', cap, base, x, alt)
      } else {
        sprintf('![%s](%s%s)', cap, base, x)
        }
  })
